facebook.summary: New in #orthopedics: Carpal Tunnel Syndrome and Related Median Neuropathies. Practical and user-friendly, this text provides the orthopedic and hand surgeon with all the essential information for diagnosing and treating carpal tunnel syndrome (CTS) and oth

author.name: Loree Kalliainen
author.description: I am a plastic surgeon at UNC. I love hand & nerve surgery, improving patient care, reading, travel (esp New Zealand, India), & being on husband's racing crew.
